nodes.text: This is a dark old chest. Who knows how long it's been hiding here...
It looks like a rusty old Marlowe class lock. It's going to be tricky to pick.
Looks like it has one of those tricky sort of locks.
What do you know - it's locked. I guess that's a good thing. No sense in locking an empty chest.
Wait... there's also some sort of trap set up in the lock...
Now it's just a dark old empty chest. A dark, creepy, old chest with a very complex lock on it.
I'll have to figure this trap out...
Ah, that was it.
Ack!
Well, that didn't work out so well...
It's old and musty and kind of creepy. I really don't want to bother taking this thing.
All right... tricky lock, here I come...
Ah, yes - you're no match for my skills, lock!
Ugh. This is a very tricky lock. I'll need to work on my skills.
Trouble is, I don't have anything suitable for that.
Yikes!
Ugh... Now I don't feel so well. I guess I should have checked for traps more carefully.
I hope this chest is worth all the effort it took to open it...

Okay, there's a rusty dagger that looks like it was the murder weapon in some very old mystery book, the skull of some large animal, and some rotten cloth that may or may not have been stained with blood.
Wrapped in the cloth is a container of something nasty. It's a Vial of Vile.
Under the skull, it looks like some sort of runestone.
It's an Incendia Runestone.
It's a red tile with some sort of flame symbol on it.
There are some scattered coins in the bottom of the chest. They're stuck to the bottom in what I hope isn't dried blood or poison.
I think anything else in this chest should be buried.
There's no magic on the outside, but there's something magical inside this chest... feels like something to do with fire or flames.
